Classes

These are nice data types for dealing with... Data!

eff_args
class eff_args {
                 object obj;
                 class spell_info spell;
                 int id;
}
spell_info
class spell_info {
                   string name;
                   int target_type;
                   class spell_stage * stages;
                   string * needed;
                   string tell_final;
                   string say_final;
}
spell_stage
class spell_stage {
                    string skill;
                    int difficulty;
                    string tell_msg;
                    string say_msg;
                    string * consumed;
}
